metadata.job_to_be_done: Prepare a vegetarian buffet-style dinner menu for a corporate gathering, including gluten-free items.

extracted_sections.section_title:  Shredded lettuce, diced tomatoes, shredded cheese, sour cream, and salsa for toppings Instructions:
 2 tablespoons vegetable oil  Tortillas for serving  Shredded lettuce, diced tomatoes, shredded cheese, sour cream, and salsa for toppings Instructions:
 Sliced green onions for garnish Instructions:
 1 pound chicken thighs, cut into bite-sized pieces  1/4 cup soy sauce  1/4 cup mirin  1/4 cup sake  2 tablespoons sugar  Bamboo skewers  Sliced green onions for garnish Instructions:
 Chopped parsley for garnish  Cooked couscous for serving Instructions:

subsection_analysis.refined_text:  In a skillet, cook ground beef over medium heat until browned.  Add diced onion and minced garlic, sauté until softened.  Stir in tacseasoning and water, simmer until thickened.  Serve beef mixture in tacshells or tortillas with desired toppings.

 In a large skillet, heat vegetable oil over medium heat.  Cook sliced chicken, bell pepper, and onion until chicken is cooked through and vegetables are tender.  Stir in fajita seasoning and cook for an additional 2 minutes.  Serve chicken and vegetables in tortillas with desired toppings.

 In a bowl, mix soy sauce, mirin, sugar, sake, grated ginger, and minced garlic.  Marinate chicken thighs in the mixture for at least 30 minutes.  Heat vegetable oil in a skillet over medium heat.  Cook chicken thighs until browned and cooked through.  Pour marinade intthe skillet and simmer until thickened.  Serve chicken over cooked rice, garnished with sliced green onions.

 In a bowl, mix soy sauce, mirin, sake, and sugar.  Marinate chicken pieces in the mixture for at least 30 minutes.  Thread chicken ontbamboskewers.  Preheat grill tmedium. high heat.  Grill chicken, brushing with marinade, until cooked through.  Garnish with sliced green onions and serve.

 In a large pot, heat olive oil over medium heat.  Brown chicken thighs on all sides, then set aside.  Sauté onion and garlic until softened.  Stir in cumin, cinnamon, and turmeric, then add chicken broth, apricots, and olives.  Return chicken tthe pot, cover, and simmer for 45 minutes until tender.  Season with salt and pepper.  Garnish with parsley and serve over couscous.
